today.name: SUUNS
today.desc: Suuns is a Canadian rock band from Montreal. The group was formed in the summer of 2007 when vocalist/guitarist Ben Shemie and guitarist/bassist Joe Yarmush got together to make some beats which quickly evolved into a few songs.

today.desc: Enjoy the After After party with Tracy Jordan at the Docks.

yesterday.name: All Makes Parts and Collisions
yesterday.desc: All Makes Parts & Collisions was a band existing around Canadian musician Alden Penner (of The Unicorns and Clues) around 2002. yesterday.name: Fireworks at the Navy Yard
yesterday.desc: Fireworks going off at the navy yard starting at 9pm. With no cops and outdoor drinks allowed, come by to enjoy the warm weather and knock back some beers.
